online: electron mailer is online and ready to send emails.
offline: electron mailer is offline. unable to send emails.
mailTo: enter email addresses seperated either by a comma or space. click default to load your default mailTo address or import to load a saved list of addresses
mailFrom: enter email addresses seperated either by a comma or space. click default to load your default mailTo address or import to load a saved list of addresses
mailSubject: enter email addresses seperated either by a comma or space. click default to load your default mailTo address or import to load a saved list of addresses
